professional_summary: Multi-disciplinary designer with a strong marketing and entrepreneurial background. Experienced in leading design projects from start to finish, on time, on budget and with excellent quality. Specializes in graphic design, interior design, and marketing with proven success in project management and creative direction.

work_experience.description: Launched and operates freelance design business specializing in graphic design, interiors, logos, website makeovers, business name generation and marketing
responsibilities: Spearheaded interior design of two Eco Chateau wellness spas
Directed multiple creative projects and photoshoots
Designed ecommerce websites and marketing collateral

certifications.name: Rising Star Award
certifications.issuer: National Association of Women Business Owners
